channel.title: POLL: Should King keep Order Execute?
channel.description:
# What do you think about King having Order Execute?
[poll type=regular public=true] * Order Execute should be replaced * Order Execute should stay [/poll]

item.title: POLL: Should King keep Order Execute?
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
So? It’s mostly the NK attacking the king.

Read full topic
item.source: POLL: Should King keep Order Execute?

item.title: POLL: Should King keep Order Execute?
item.dc:creator: dlxhazedxlb
item.description:
but that’s still killing a perfectly useful ability for either side

Read full topic
item.source: POLL: Should King keep Order Execute?

item.title: POLL: Should King keep Order Execute?
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
Uh…

That’s the purpose of attacking the king N1…to get rid of a powerful ability…

Plus OE doesn’t belong on the king

(Don’t know why I said house)

Read full topic
item.source: POLL: Should King keep Order Execute?

item.title: POLL: Should King keep Order Execute?
item.dc:creator: dlxhazedxlb
item.description:
I think unused OE’s should move on to the next kings for what a useful ability it is so it doesn’t go to complete waste for those N1 king death games

Read full topic
item.source: POLL: Should King keep Order Execute?

item.title: POLL: Should King keep Order Execute?
item.dc:creator: techwolves
item.description:
Heres the problem thats not going to happen they removed allies for a reason

Read full topic
item.source: POLL: Should King keep Order Execute?

item.title: POLL: Should King keep Order Execute?
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
I like that more but I think it would be even better if King had no support abilities, and was simply so powerful with his social or voting abilities that a clever King would be considered worth protecting.

Read full topic
item.source: POLL: Should King keep Order Execute?

item.title: POLL: Should King keep Order Execute?
item.dc:creator: Alice
item.description:
He should be reworked as a social/support class. We tried an investigative King with Allies and it caused the court to become too reliant on the King for leads.

FoL’s King has supportive night abilities and social day abilities is typically agreed to be an extremely balanced and effective version of the King.

Read full topic
item.source: POLL: Should King keep Order Execute?

item.title: POLL: Should King keep Order Execute?
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
I mean the real reason I want OE gone is cuz I hate when I stoneskin and king attacks me for no reason for the lulz even tho I am confirmed

Read full topic
item.source: POLL: Should King keep Order Execute?

item.source: POLL: Should King keep Order Execute?

item.title: POLL: Should King keep Order Execute?
item.dc:creator: livejamie
item.description:
I’d like to see King reworked into more of an investigative or special class rather than a killer.

The thing that sucks about the current system is your faction is really held back if your king dcs or goes afk on n1.

Read full topic
item.source: POLL: Should King keep Order Execute?

item.dc:creator: santana
item.description:

item.source: POLL: Should King keep Order Execute?

item.title: POLL: Should King keep Order Execute?
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
I think instead of a poll we should vote and say why we voted that. I’ll start.

King doesn’t need a killing power. Possessor SHOULD be able to out run it. King should instead have more power during the day instead of night. Like night abilities that affect day.

Give me one good reason why king even needs OE

Read full topic
item.source: POLL: Should King keep Order Execute?
